text:
"Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus" is a video game from the "Sly Cooper" series for the PlayStation 2. It was released in September 2002.
In "Sly Cooper and the Thievius Raccoonus", the player controls a raccoon named Sly Cooper.
Plot.
Sly Cooper went to Paris and got his case file. Sly got his case file so he can track down the pages of the Thievius Raccoonus, a book written by his family.
